Name: Serpent Showdown
About the game: Serpent Showdown is a competitive arena fighter for all ages! Play as two classroom pet snakes, battling it out to see who'll reign victorious. Two snakes enter, one snake leaves! You and a friend go head-to-head in a battle of the ages! It is time to don your... cardboard armor, and grab your trusty crayon?! Strike, slither and slash your way to victory, in this entertaining competitive arena fighter! Coming soon to PC and Nintendo Switch.
